title: Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition. Talks & Interviews
abstract: Interviews & talks with Australian filmmakers of some of our country's most iconic music videos. Created for 'Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition'.
description: In celebration of ACMI's 'Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition' (26 September 2013 - 23 February 2014) ACMI interviewed Australian filmmakers responisble for creating some of our country's most iconic music videos. Directors interviewed include: Leo Baker, Natasha Pincus, Paul Goldman and the creative team Oh Yeah Wow. In addition to these Director Showcase series titles, ACMI also held some panel-style talks and other interviews. Key creatives featured are Gotye and his collaborators, Hello Flux and exhibition curator's Jonathan Wells and Meg Grey Wells.
